title: Golden Eagle Attacks Norwegian Toddler, Killed By Gamekeeper: Report
content: A golden eagle attacked a toddler in Norway on Sunday, with her mother and a neighbour fighting the bird off repeatedly until a game warden killed it, Norwegian media reported.
summary: A golden eagle attacked a toddler in Norway on Sunday, with her mother and a neighbour fighting the bird off repeatedly until a game warden killed it, Norwegian media reported.

title: Protests Across 25 Countries Over Kolkata Rape-Murder Case
content: Thousands of diaspora Indians were protesting in more than 130 cities across 25 countries on Sunday, organisers said, to demand justice after last month's rape and murder of a trainee doctor at a hospital in the city of Kolkata.
summary: Thousands of diaspora Indians were protesting in more than 130 cities across 25 countries on Sunday, organisers said, to demand justice after last month's rape and murder of a trainee doctor at a hospital in the city of Kolkata.

title: Kamala Harris Recalls Walks With Her Grandfather,  And What They Discussed
content: Indian-origin Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris on Sunday, recalling her fond memories with her grandparents in India, wished National Grandparents Day to all the grandparents who help shape and inspire the next generation.
summary: Indian-origin Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris on Sunday, recalling her fond memories with her grandparents in India, wished National Grandparents Day to all the grandparents who help shape and inspire the next generation.

title: Trump, Harris Tied In Latest Polls Ahead Of Televised Presidential Debate
content: The US presidential race remains neck-and-neck according to polls released Sunday, two days before Kamala Harris and Donald Trump hold their first -- and potentially only -- televised debate.
summary: The US presidential race remains neck-and-neck according to polls released Sunday, two days before Kamala Harris and Donald Trump hold their first -- and potentially only -- televised debate.

title: "We Are Afraid": Israeli Strike Kills Gaza Civil Emergency Service Director
content: An Israeli airstrike on a house in Jabalia on Sunday killed Mohammad Morsi, deputy director of the Gaza Civil Emergency Service in the northern areas of the Gaza Strip, and four of his family, health officials said.
summary: An Israeli airstrike on a house in Jabalia on Sunday killed Mohammad Morsi, deputy director of the Gaza Civil Emergency Service in the northern areas of the Gaza Strip, and four of his family, health officials said.

title: 48 Killed After Fuel Truck Explodes In Nigeria After Collision With Vehicle
content: At least 48 people were killed on Sunday in a fuel tanker truck explosion following a collision with another vehicle in north-central Nigeria, the state's disaster management agency said.
summary: At least 48 people were killed on Sunday in a fuel tanker truck explosion following a collision with another vehicle in north-central Nigeria, the state's disaster management agency said.

title: "Violent Clouds": 4 Dead, 14 Missing After Heavy Flooding Morocco
content: Moroccan authorities on Sunday said four people died and 14 were missing in flooding caused by an "exceptional" climate phenomenon in southern areas.
summary: Moroccan authorities on Sunday said four people died and 14 were missing in flooding caused by an "exceptional" climate phenomenon in southern areas.

title: Russian Military Drone Crashes On NATO Territory, Says Latvia
content: Latvia's president on Sunday said a Russian military drone had crashed on its territory, adding that airspace breaches had increased along NATO's eastern borders.
summary: Latvia's president on Sunday said a Russian military drone had crashed on its territory, adding that airspace breaches had increased along NATO's eastern borders.

title: US Mass Shooting Suspect's Mother Warned School Before Attack: Report
content: The mother of the teenager charged with fatally shooting two students and two teachers at a Georgia high school on Wednesday called the school that morning and warned a counselor about an "extreme emergency," the Washington Post reported.
summary: The mother of the teenager charged with fatally shooting two students and two teachers at a Georgia high school on Wednesday called the school that morning and warned a counselor about an "extreme emergency," the Washington Post reported.

title: Chinese Man, 30, Dies After Working For 104 Days With Only 1 Day Off
content: He died from multiple organ failure due to a pneumococcal infection, often linked to a weakened immune system.
summary: He died from multiple organ failure due to a pneumococcal infection, often linked to a weakened immune system.

title: Greece To Impose Fee On Cruise Passengers To Mykonos And Santorini
content: Greece plans to impose a 20-euro levy on cruise ship visitors to the islands of Santorini and Mykonos during the peak summer season, in a bid to avert overtourism, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said on Sunday.
summary: Greece plans to impose a 20-euro levy on cruise ship visitors to the islands of Santorini and Mykonos during the peak summer season, in a bid to avert overtourism, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said on Sunday.

title: Egyptian Archaeologist Calls On Berlin To Return Queen Nefertiti Bust
content: Prominent Egyptian archaeologist and former antiquities minister Zahi Hawass has launched a petition for the return to Egypt of the pharaonic bust of Queen Nefertiti from the Neues Museum in Berlin.
summary: Prominent Egyptian archaeologist and former antiquities minister Zahi Hawass has launched a petition for the return to Egypt of the pharaonic bust of Queen Nefertiti from the Neues Museum in Berlin.

title: Brought Out India's Deep Historical Connect: Minister Visits Saudi Museum
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar arrived in the Saudi capital Riyadh on Sunday on a two-day visit to attend the first India-Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) foreign ministers' meeting.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar arrived in the Saudi capital Riyadh on Sunday on a two-day visit to attend the first India-Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) foreign ministers' meeting.

title: Opinion: Trump's Latest Problem? Republicans For Harris: Patricia Lopez
content: Michael Brodkorb, former deputy chair of Minnesota Republican Party, is part of a growing wave that could affect the outcome of the November election: lifelong Republicans who have broken with Donald Trump to support Vice President Kamala Harris.
summary: Michael Brodkorb, former deputy chair of Minnesota Republican Party, is part of a growing wave that could affect the outcome of the November election: lifelong Republicans who have broken with Donald Trump to support Vice President Kamala Harris.

title: Crown Prince Of Abu Dhabi Arrives In India, To Meet PM Modi On Monday
content: The Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi, Sheikh Khaled bin Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, arrived in New Delhi on his first official visit to India at the invitation of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, on Sunday.
summary: The Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi, Sheikh Khaled bin Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, arrived in New Delhi on his first official visit to India at the invitation of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, on Sunday.

title: China Woman Claims Son Developed Vitiligo After Being Slapped By Teacher
content: What exactly causes vitiligo is not clear, but experts say that environmental stress factors can contribute to its onset.
summary: What exactly causes vitiligo is not clear, but experts say that environmental stress factors can contribute to its onset.

title: Bangladesh To Extradite Sheikh Hasina From India, Try Her On Mass Killing Charge
content: Bangladesh will take necessary steps to extradite deposed prime minister Sheikh Hasina from India to try her on charges of mass killings during the student-led movement, the chief prosecutor of the country's International Crimes Tribunal said.
summary: Bangladesh will take necessary steps to extradite deposed prime minister Sheikh Hasina from India to try her on charges of mass killings during the student-led movement, the chief prosecutor of the country's International Crimes Tribunal said.

title: First The Middle East, Then Europe - S Jaishankar's Key Meetings This Week
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, who is currently in Saudi Arabia for a key Gulf summit, will travel to Germany and Switzerland later this week on an official visit.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, who is currently in Saudi Arabia for a key Gulf summit, will travel to Germany and Switzerland later this week on an official visit.

title: Tim Cook Explains Why Apple Manufactures iPhones In China. Elon Musk Reacts
content: Ahead of the iPhone 16 series launch, a throwback video of Apple CEO Tim Cook has gone viral on social media where he addresses the common misconceptions about why the US-based company invested in China for manufacturing of its products.
summary: Ahead of the iPhone 16 series launch, a throwback video of Apple CEO Tim Cook has gone viral on social media where he addresses the common misconceptions about why the US-based company invested in China for manufacturing of its products.

title: 3 Israelis Killed In Shooting Near Jordan Border, Gunman Shot Dead
content: A truck driver shot dead three Israeli guards at a border crossing between the occupied West Bank and Jordan Sunday before being "eliminated", Israel's military said, as it pounded Gaza with new strikes.
summary: A truck driver shot dead three Israeli guards at a border crossing between the occupied West Bank and Jordan Sunday before being "eliminated", Israel's military said, as it pounded Gaza with new strikes.
